testcase.name: Open guardian news article
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the guardian page.......................................passed When I select news from the menu............................................passed And I select the news making headlines......................................passed Then I could read the news article making headline..........................passed And I should be able to see the main information in the news................passed

testcase.name: Check the main information in the news using google resource
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the google..............................................passed When I am searching for news from the menu..................................passed Then I should see a list of other sources with similar information..........passed And I could confirm that the news article is valid..........................passed
